body.p:
Greenupsburgh Ky
May 18" 1863
Hon Jas F. Robinson
Govern of Ky,
Frankfort
Ky
Dear Sir

We heard the testimony in the case of the Commonwealth agst Alexander Harman for breach of Honor obligation, & we think from all the circumstances, that the fine is excessive and extremely onerous, & presents a fair case for the interposition of Executive clemency

Respy yours
Thos J. Throop
Ed F Dulin
Geo, E, Roe
